description: A Reclaimer at Orphan. Disgruntled at the way Yuu was favored from his parents, he became very bitter towards him and wants to compete who is the strongest Antibody pilot. And even his resentment towards his real mother, Capt. Anoa McCormick since he was abandoned since childhood, but was replaced by his undying loyalty to Baron Maximillian. He is agressive and powerful. Commonly competing with Quincy Issa for control of the Reclaimers. He is always eager to fight and desires to beat both Yuu and Quincy. He is afraid of living and fighting independently.
name: Jonathan Glenn
